participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Energetic and sociable, Jake loves to engage with friends and enjoys physical activities.
participant_1.background: I had a party with my friends and we played arm wrestling. I watch basketball. My mom went crazy when I was three and I have not seen her since. My laundry schedule is based on the amount of running I do that week. Unfortunately, my family lives across the country from me.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily has a passion for music and values her independence.
participant_2.background: I was a musician before my current job. I am not close to my family because of what happened when I was a child. Everyday after work I buy my dog a dog biscuit. I enjoy water skiing but feel like I need to find another creative outlet to express myself. I've got a pretty big collection of old music records that I like to show my kids.

content.text: Hey! It was good. I went water skiing and played with my dogs. What did you do?
I had a party with my friends and we played arm wrestling. I also did some laundry.
That sounds fun. I used to do arm wrestling a lot when I was younger.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I'm sorry to hear that you're not close to your family.
Thanks. It's tough sometimes, but I'm trying to make the best of it.
It's good that you're trying to stay positive. What do you do for work?
I'm a musician. I used to play in a band, but now I'm a music teacher.
That's awesome! I love music. Do you have any favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands. Some of my favorites are The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Pink Floyd.
Those are all great bands! I love The Beatles.
They're my favorite band. I've been listening to them since I was a kid.
Yeah, they're one of those bands that you can listen to no matter what mood you're in.
I'm glad we have something in common.
